name: TheOvertake
description:
Controls:

Left/Right arrow - change lane
ESC - pause game

Description:

This is the unique racing - arcade game. Select and tune up your car, jump in and overtake everyone on your way to the goal! Every level is hand made to deliver the best game experience, and after completing all 30 levels you unlock even harder challenges.

The game is also available on Google Play Store which is primary release platform. In Play Store you can always find the most up to date version.

Shout-out:

If you like the game please download it to your phone and give it a good rate on Play Store! This will be the best support for my work :) Thanks!
